title: Blade of Grass
summaries: The Blade of Grass is a broadsword crafted using materials from the Underground Jungle. It has a decent size and swing reach, and has a 25% chance of inflicting the Poisoned debuff for 7 seconds upon striking enemies. It is also one of the key ingredients in crafting the Night's Edge.

On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, Blade of Grass is roughly equal to the Volcano in size, making it one of the largest swords in Pre-Hardmode. When swung, it fires a small, green Leaf Blade projectile that flies upwards in a circle, leaving behind a green particle effect resembling leaves. The Leaf Blade projectile has 20 armor penetration, can automatically target enemies within a radius of 9.375 tiles, deals 25% base damage (4 base damage), 100% knockback (4.5 (Average)), and has the same chance to inflict Poisoned for the same duration as the sword itself.
